inscription:
Inscription

front of tower, in yellow rectangle: [DAY BY DAY / A PENNY / A MEAL]; lower PL, in yellow rectangle: [GOD LOVETH A CHEERFUL GIVER]; lower PR side, in yellow rectangle: [OUT OF LOVE TO OUR SAVIOR]; bottom PR, in red, white and blue shield: [J. CHEIN / MADE IN / U.S.A.]
object_name: Day by Day, a Penny a Meal still bank
title: Day by Day, a Penny a Meal still bank
